pr_title: MINOR: Filter out quota configs for ConfigCommand using --bootstrap-server

timeline.message: MINOR: Filter out quota configs for ConfigCommand using --bootstrap-server

timeline.bodyText: nit: I would add a small comment to explain why we do this here.
timeline.author: dajac

replies.bodyText: @dajac Thanks for the review, added comment.
replies.author: rajinisivaram

timeline.bodyText: Should the same thing happen in public AlterClientQuotasResponse(Collection<ClientQuotaEntity> entities, int throttleTimeMs, Throwable e) for consistency?  And also maybe in IncrementalAlterConfigsResponse (public static IncrementalAlterConfigsResponseData toResponseData)?
timeline.author: rondagostino

replies.bodyText: @rondagostino Thanks for the review. Updated AlterClientQuotasResponse. I think IncrementalAlterConfigsResponse is ok since it uses ApiError, we create the error with the right message when converting from Throwable. Can you just verify that the method with ApiError was the one you meant? Thanks,
replies.author: rajinisivaram
